summary: Some Personal Patches I use as I could not find adequate versions on Nexus.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][size=3]These are just some fixes I use personally, and I figure if I use them, I'm sure there are some other who also may want them but don't have the CS skills to do it themselves. I'll keep adding as I find any more conflicts or stuff I want to change.[/size]

- Fix for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61608/?]JK's Winterhold[/url] (and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61035/?]JK's Skyrim[/url]) and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33766/?]Agent Of Righteous Might[/url][/size]
Moves the Temple of Stendarr slightly out of Winterhold so it does not sit on top of the well and some other stuff added by JK's mods. Does not modify JK's mods in anyway, simply replace 'AgentOfRighteousMight.esp' with this, contains only the .esp, you will still require Agent Of Righteous Might for all the other assets. The .esp is the latest version of AoRM and I don't expect the author to update it anytime in the future. I did it like this as I didn't want yet another .esp in my load list.

[size=4]- Count the Dead 2K4[/size]
I made this to alleviate the issue that arise with such mods as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9494]WARZONES 2015 - Civil Unrest[/url] by [b]MyGoodEye[/b] where an excess of dead bodies (that being 3 in a warzone) would have the oldest bodies vanish into thin air right in front of your eyes

[i][u][b]Be warned[/b][/u][/i]; this is not for slower computers and a heightened amount of models in game can slow your frame rate if you
amount too many dead in one area.

What this changes;
iRemoveExcessDeadCount = 40 [size=1](default = 15)[/size]
iRemoveExcessDeadTotalActorCount = 80 [size=1](default = 20)[/size]
iRemoveExcessDeadComplexCount = 40[size=1] (default = 3)[/size]
iRemoveExcessDeadComplexTotalActorCount = 80 [size=1](default = 20)[/size]
author: Carnage2K4

files.name: Fix for JKs Winterhold and Agent Of Righteous Might
